questions.text: How would you describe your skin’s oil production throughout the day?

options.text: My skin gets shiny and oily in just a few hours.
I have dry patches and my skin feels tight.
My skin is normal but gets oily in certain areas (like my T-sone).
I don't experience much oil but i do get redness or irritation.

questions.text: Which best describes how your skin feels after washing?

options.text: Clean, but shiny after a few hours.
Clean, but feels tight and dry.
My skin feels fine, no tightness or oil.
My skin feels sensitive, a little irritated after using certain products.

questions.text: Do you experience breakouts? If so, how frequently?

options.text: Regular breakouts, especially around my forehead, chin, or cheeks.
I rarely break out, but I do get clogged pores or blackheads.
I don’t break out often, but I have some dry patches.
Breakouts are rare for me, but I struggle with texture, redness, or sensitivity.

questions.text: How would you describe your skin’s texture?

options.text: I have noticeable bumps or enlarged pores.
My skin is mostly smooth but feels dry in some spots.
My skin is balanced and smooth, but it’s a little oily in areas.
My skin feels rough, sensitive, or has signs of aging (fine lines/wrinkles).

questions.text: How does your skin react to new products?

options.text: I don’t have many issues with new products.
My skin gets irritated easily.
I’m careful about new products because they can trigger breakouts.
My skin reacts to strong or harsh products (e.g., stinging, redness).

questions.text: Which concerns best match your current skin goals? (Select up to 3)

options.text: Managing breakouts and controlling oil
Soothing dryness and flakiness
Hydrating without feeling greasy
Reducing redness and calming sensitive areas
Targeting fine lines, wrinkles, or loss of elasticity

questions.text: What age range are you in? (Helps customize recommendations)

options.text: Under 18

questions.text: Would you like to receive personalized product recommendations and exclusive updates about ENME?

options.text: Yes
No
